title: Reflect & Reinforce
description:
You did great, if you had some
 slip up, don't worry, you are trying
 and that's admirable!
what-did-you-learn-from-last-night: What did you learn from last night?
take-a-moment-to-reflect-on-your-experie: Take a moment to reflect on your experience.
what-did-you-learn-from-last-night-descr: What did you learn from last night?
what-went-well-what-and-what-felt-right-: What went well, what didn't, and what felt right or not?. Take a moment to reflect on what last night showed you the choices you made, how you felt, and what you discovered.
remember-when-you-mess-up: <0>Remember:</0> When you mess up, those moments are golden opportunities to learn, adjust, and grow.
stay-hydrated-description: Research shows that <0>alcohol dehydrates</0> your body by causing you to lose more water than you consume. Drinking water after alcohol <1>helps restore hydration</1> and reduce hangover symptoms.
